name: Cloak of Darkness
description:
A game from 90s, reimagined in 2017.

Original game by Roger Firth. This version: Alexander Yakovlev. The illustration is by Maria Filippova. Other credits are listed on the OPTIONS screen.

Features from 2017:

  • Tablet-optimized, mouse-accessible responsive interface
  • Automap
  • Autosaving and autoloading
  • Online Multiplayer with voice chat
  • Night mode

The game is open source; you can browse the source code here.

You also can buy the cover in big resolution (scanned by the author, unscaled lossless image). All of the earnings go to the artist. If you need an even bigger scan, just ask.
